title: Operator
post:
{{Sidebar("Glossary")}}

Reserved **syntax** consisting of punctuation or alphanumeric characters that carries out built-in functionality. For example, in JavaScript the addition operator ("+") adds numbers together and concatenates strings, whereas the "not" operator ("!") negates an expression â€” for example making a `true` statement return `false`.
